text: Thanks both for your reply! I think the shopping cart with add to cart buttons would be the better option for them. Do you perhaps have an example of these HS websites with both options? :innocent:
With Shopify, you'll also need this app installed <https://apps.shopify.com/digital-downloads>
I'll try to find a link for the demo we had
Note, this demo isn't using the digital downloads app so I would test that out to be sure but it should work.
